price: (20) Say, [O Muḥammad], "I only invoke my Lord and do not associate with Him anyone."
arabic: قُلۡ إِنَّمَآ أَدۡعُواْ رَبِّي وَلَآ أُشۡرِكُ بِهِۦٓ أَحَدٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qul innamā adʿū rabbī walā ush'riku bihi aḥadan
